question: Show concerts and theater plays taking place in a venue with a capacity of 500.
sql_query1:
SELECT Live_Event.Title 
FROM Live_Event
WHERE (Live_Event.Live_Performance = "Concert" OR Live_Event.Live_Performance = "Theater Play") AND Live_Event.Venue_Capacity = 500
sql_query2:
SELECT Live_Event.Title 
FROM Live_Event
WHERE Live_Event.Live_Performance = "Concert" OR Live_Event.Live_Performance = "Theater Play" AND Live_Event.Venue_Capacity = 500
interpretation1: Which concerts are in a venue that has a capacity of 500 and which theater plays are in a venue with the same capacity?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all concerts and also provide a list of theater play with a venue with a capacity of 500.
